CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 16, 1951, pg. 9 reads: "Those Who Received Degrees At Pitt - Rain...change in plans for a commencement on the ..Pittsburgh lawn here Wednesday morning. As...receiving degrees from Pitt undergraduate...given them at ceremonies at 10:30 A.M. in...Degrees from graduate schools at Pitt were...ceremony later the same day at 2:30 P.M. in ...The Courier cameraman was able to snap the persons shown above as they prepared to receive their degrees in time for this week's deadline.  There'll be more pictures of degree winners, both from the undergraduate school and the graduate school of Pitt, as well as Carnegie Institute of Technology's graduates printed in next week's edition of the Courier.  Duquesne University's graduates were printed last week.  Left photo: Sanford Gloster, Herbert Thornhill and Milton Woods were granted Bachelor of Science degrees from the college at Pitt... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of University of Pittsburgh graduates Sanford Gloster, Herbert Thornhill, and Milton Woods, standing in Syria Mosque, Oakland
